creditline: Gift of Mrs. John P. Rutherfurd in Memory of her father Mr. Thomas Shevlin
description: hexagonally-lobed faience plate with gilded edge/rim; painted in decor bois pattern, a Niderviller invention; center filled with trompe l'oeil engraving of seacoast town replete with ruins; signature appears below engraving
text: This object is decorated with tromp l'oeil painted decoration depicting a romantic landscape drawing on paper attached to a wooden plaque.
title: Plate
